tool_description: Optimizes the order and grouping of resume sections based on industry best practices, career level, and content strength.
error_messages: Insufficient sections: Provide at least 3 resume sections for organization.
Empty industry field: Specify target industry for appropriate section ordering.
Invalid experience level: Provide valid experience level information.
Priority section mismatch: Priority sections must exist in parsed sections list.
usage: Provide parsed sections, industry, and experience level. Optionally specify section priorities. Returns optimized section order with rationale.

optimized_order.description: Optimized section order from top to bottom
